snippet.textDisplay:
I think that this game only released on the MSX, which was a cartridge computer, not a console. Do not confuse this game with Snake's Revenge, which was NOT a Metal Gear game, and not the true sequal to the first Metal Gear game.

If you haven't played this Metal Gear, and are a fan of classic games, this game is a must play. It is one of the best classic games I've played. The theme song speaks to the epicness of this installment. It's more than worthy of the title Metal Gear.
snippet.textOriginal:
I think that this game only released on the MSX, which was a cartridge computer, not a console. Do not confuse this game with Snake's Revenge, which was NOT a Metal Gear game, and not the true sequal to the first Metal Gear game.

If you haven't played this Metal Gear, and are a fan of classic games, this game is a must play. It is one of the best classic games I've played. The theme song speaks to the epicness of this installment. It's more than worthy of the title Metal Gear.
